name: Launchify- Quick App Shortcuts
description: Quick shortcuts for apps on your lock screen & notification bar!  Launchify provides you quick access to apps when you need them on your notification bar, lock screen(*4.4+) and even as a widget. Launchify recommends you the right app at the right time depending on the time, place and if youre driving! Multi-task on the go: you can now swap apps in just a swipe from your notification bar. Quick launch apps from your lock screen.  Launchify is not a launcher, it provides smart app shortcuts in your navigation bar and lock screen similar to a notification.  Featured on Google Play, The Next Web, Mashable, Gizmodo, Android Community & Product Hunt!  Enable lock screen notifications to get Launchify on the lock screen.
